power.title: Amoth's Grace
power.fluff: Through Amoth's power, you channel strength to your allies, allowing them to stand fast against evil

section.name: Channel Divinity:
section.text: You can only use one Channel Divinity power per encounter

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You or an ally within range are either subject to a critical hit or bloodied by an attack

section.name: Target:
section.text: The triggering creature

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target can spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to his or her healing surge value.

power.title: Ancestral Guidance
power.fluff: You call upon the ancestor spirits to guide your path

section.name: Channel Divinity:
section.text: You can only use one Channel Divinity power per encounter

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You make a skill check and dislike the result

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You gain a power bonus to the triggering roll equal to your Wisdom modifier.

power.title: Angharradh's Favor
power.fluff: Angharradh blesses those who show resolve and determination in the face of evil

section.name: Channel Divinity:
section.text: You can only use one Channel Divinity power per encounter

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You or an ally within range succeeds on a saving throw

section.name: Target:
section.text: One ally

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target gains a +4 power bonus to saving throws until the end of his or her next turn.

power.title: Anthem of Civilization
power.fluff: You inspire your allies to work in concert to turn the tide of battle

section.name: Channel Divinity:
section.text: You can only use one Channel Divinity power per encounter

section.name: Target:
section.text: You, or one ally in the burst

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, the target gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls against any enemy he or she flanks.

power.title: Arawai's Abundance
power.fluff: Araway shelters those who receive her blessings

section.name: Channel Divinity:
section.text: You can only use one Channel Divinity power per encounter

section.name: Target:
section.text: One ally in the burst

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target can spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to his or her healing surge value.
In addition, the target gains a +2 power bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Arcana Ward
power.fluff: Your god's comprehension of arcane mysteries extends to shielding you from them

section.name: Channel Divinity:
section.text: You can only use one Channel Divinity power per encounter

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You would take damage from an Arcane attack or other source

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, you gain resist 5 to all damage from attacks and other sources with the Arcane keyword.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: Resist 10.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: Resist 15.

power.title: Armor of Bahamut
power.fluff: Bahamut protects you or a friend from devastating harm

section.name: Channel Divinity:
section.text: You can only use one Channel Divinity power per encounter

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy scores a critical hit against you or an ally within range

section.name: Target:
section.text: The triggering attack

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The critical hit becomes a normal hit.

power.title: Asmodeus's Fiery Command
power.fluff: Asmodeus rewards those who please him and destroys those who fail

section.name: Channel Divinity:
section.text: You can only use one Channel Divinity power per encounter

section.name: Target:
section.text: One ally in the burst

section.name: Effect:
section.text: If the target hits and enemy with an attack before the end of his or her next turn, the attack deals an additional 5 fire damage, and the target gains 5 temporary hit points.
If the target does not hit with an attack before the end of his or her next turn, the target and each creature adjacent to him or her take 5 fire damage.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: 10 fire damage or temporary hit points.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 15 fire damage or temporary hit points.

power.title: Aureon's Instruction
power.fluff: You tap into Aureon's vast wisdom to aid in your research and understanding

section.name: Channel Divinity:
section.text: You can only use one Channel Divinity power per encounter

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, when you make a knowledge or monster knowledge check you make two rolls and use the higher result.

power.title: Avandra's Rescue
power.fluff: Avandra smiles upon you and helps you rescrue a friend in need

section.name: Channel Divinity:
section.text: You can only use one Channel Divinity power per encounter

section.name: Target:
section.text: One ally who is the same size as you or smaller

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You slide both you and the target 1 square, swapping positions.

power.title: Balinor's Prey
power.fluff: The hunt is sweet, but the kill is sweeter

section.name: Channel Divinity:
section.text: You can only use one Channel Divinity power per encounter

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The next melee or ranged attack that hits the target before the end of your next turn deals 1d6 additional damage.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: 2d6 additional damage.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 3d6 additional damage.

power.title: Bane's Instructive Stratagem
power.fluff: Bane shows the clear path to victory to your allies, and punishes those who do not follow it

section.name: Channel Divinity:
section.text: You can only use one Channel Divinity power per encounter

section.name: Target:
section.text: Each ally in the burst

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each target gains a +1 power bonus to all attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

While the target has the bonus, if his or her first attack hits an enemy, that attack deals 2 extra damage. If the attack misses, he or she instead grants combat advantage until the end of his or her next turn.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: 4 extra damage.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 6 extra damage damage.

power.title: Bane's Tactics
power.fluff: Your training and the strength of Bane allow you to strike with skill like no other

section.name: Channel Divinity:
section.text: You can only use one Channel Divinity power per encounter

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You make an opportunity attack

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You can use one of your 1st-level at-will melee attack powers in place of your melee basic attack, and deal additional damage equal to your Strength modifier if you hit.
You can only target the creature that triggered the opportunity attack, even if the power could normally target more than one creature.

power.title: Bane's Tyrannical Transference
power.fluff: You call on Bane to transfer a hindrance to another - someone better suited to endure its consequences

section.name: Channel Divinity:
section.text: You can only use one Channel Divinity power per encounter

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You or an ally in the burst becomes dazed, immobilized, stunned, or slowed

section.name: Target:
section.text: You, or an ally in the burst

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target is affected by the triggering effect instead of the triggering creature.
This power does not affect any damage that might accompany the effect.

power.title: Beacon of Dol Arrah
power.fluff: You let Dol Arrah's light shine through

section.name: Channel Divinity:
section.text: You can only use one Channel Divinity power per encounter

section.name: Effect:
section.text: All squares within 5 squares of you are illuminated by bright light until the end of your next turn.
You and any ally in the light can reroll any damage die roll of 1 or 2 when using a Radiant attack power.

section.name: Special:
section.text: If you use this power when not in combat, the light lasts for 1 hour or until you regain the use of Channel Divinity, whichever comes first. When used in this way, this power does not allow for rerolling of damage.

power.title: Berronar's Salve
power.fluff: Berronar's merciful light shines down on a sorely wounded comrade, giving him or her the strength to continue

section.name: Channel Divinity:
section.text: You can only use one Channel Divinity power per encounter

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An ally drops to 0 hit points or fewer

section.name: Target:
section.text: The triggering ally

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target can spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to his or her healing surge value.

power.title: Blessing of Silvanus
power.fluff: The deep vitality of the Oakfather wells up in your ally's heart, and for a short time, his or her wounds close on their own

section.name: Channel Divinity:
section.text: You can only use one Channel Divinity power per encounter

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An ally in the burst spends a healing surge

section.name: Target:
section.text: The triggering ally

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The ally regains a number of hit points equal to your Wisdom or Charisma modifier.
Until the end of the encounter, the target gains a +5 bonus to saving throws against ongoing damage.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 3 + Wisdom or Charisma modifier hit points.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 6 + Wisdom or Charisma modifier hit points.
